casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

01- 2114. State v. Brown.

Lucas App. No. L-00-1123. Reported at 94 Ohio St.3d 1470, 762 N.E.2d 1017. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Pfeifer, J., dissents. Lundberg Stratton, J.,

dissents, would grant the motion and allow the appeal, and would hold the cause for the decision in 01-99, State v. Walls, Butler App. No. CA99-10-174.
